name: Neymar Jr
details: Star player known for dribbling, playmaking, and scoring abilities. Neymar holds the record for Brazil's second all-time leading scorer after Pelé.

name: Alisson Becker
details: One of the world’s top goalkeepers, known for his reflexes, composure, and shot-stopping skills. Plays for Liverpool and has won the Premier League and Champions League.

name: Thiago Silva
details: Veteran center-back with leadership skills and experience in top European clubs, including PSG and Chelsea. Known for his defensive positioning and aerial ability.

name: Casemiro
details: Defensive midfielder with exceptional tackling and intercepting abilities. Anchors the midfield and has a long tenure at Real Madrid, now with Manchester United.

name: Vinícius Jr
details: Pace-driven winger known for his dribbling, creativity, and assists. Has made a major impact at Real Madrid with his rapid development and goal-scoring.

name: Marquinhos
details: Reliable center-back and occasional defensive midfielder. Known for tactical awareness and leadership, he plays for PSG.

name: Lucas Paquetá
details: Creative attacking midfielder with passing and dribbling skills. Vital in connecting midfield to attack, currently playing in the Premier League.

name: Danilo
details: Versatile full-back who can play on either side. Known for defensive stability and contributing to attack. Plays for Juventus.

name: Gabriel Jesus
details: Forward with versatility to play as a winger or central striker. Known for work rate and technical skills, representing Arsenal in the Premier League.

name: Raphinha
details: Winger known for speed and ability to beat defenders. Plays for Barcelona, contributing assists and pace to the team’s attack.

name: Rodrygo Goes
details: Young talent known for agility and goal-scoring for Real Madrid. Plays as a winger or forward and complements Brazil’s offensive options.
